statements: UPDATE transportation_costs SET cost_per_km = 5.50 WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_costs SET distance = 150.75, cost_per_km = 6.25 WHERE origin_city = 'New York' AND destination_city = 'Chicago';
UPDATE transportation_costs SET cost_per_km = 15.75 WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_costs SET distance = 350.20, origin_city = 'Chicago', cost_per_km = 20.50 WHERE route_id = 2;
UPDATE transportation_costs SET cost_per_mile = 0.25, total_cost = distance * 0.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE routes SET vehicle_type = 'Truck', start_location = 'City A', end_location = 'City B' WHERE route_id = 'R001';
UPDATE transportation_costs SET total_cost = distance * cost_per_mile WHERE route_id = '1234';
UPDATE routes SET travel_time = 120, vehicle_type = 'Truck' WHERE route_id = '5678';
UPDATE transportation_costs SET distance = 150.5, cost_per_mile = 0.75 WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE routes SET destination = 'New York', mode_of_transport = 'Train' WHERE route_id = 2;
UPDATE transportation_costs SET cost_per_mile = 0.25 WHERE route_id = 101
UPDATE expenses SET total_cost = 500.75 WHERE route_id = 203
UPDATE transportation_orders SET total_cost = total_cost + 100 WHERE order_id = 123;
UPDATE vehicles SET fuel_efficiency = fuel_efficiency * 1.1, capacity = 50 WHERE vehicle_id = 456;
UPDATE transportation_routes SET cost_per_mile = 1.5 WHERE route_id = 1001;

UPDATE vehicles SET max_capacity = 100, fuel_efficiency = 35 WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
